original_text: The king saw Esther as she stood outside in the yard. He was pleased to see her. He held out his gold sceptre towards her. Esther came near to him and she touched the top of the sceptre.
korean_text: 왕후 에스더가 뜰에 선 것을 본즉 매우 사랑스러우므로 손에 잡았던 금 규를 그에게 내미니 에스더가 가까이 가서 금 규 끝을 만진지라

sentences.original_text: as she stood outside in the yard
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 마당 밖에 서 있을 때

sentences.original_text: He was pleased to see her
He held out his gold sceptre towards her
and she touched the top of the sceptre
